enhanced_by.reason: The buildStreamUrl method relies on joinStreamUrls to format the streams into a URL-friendly string.
The buildStreamUrl method indirectly relies on urlEncode for encoding stream names if they contain special characters.
Both methods construct URLs, and the assertions for buildStreamUrl can be informed by the assertions used for buildFullUrl.
Both methods handle the joining of parameters into a URL string, and the assertions for buildStreamUrl can leverage similar logic used in joinQueryParameters.
